General.Name: Marti Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS
General.Description: Marti Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. engages in the real estate activities in Turkey. The company primarily has investments in Çerkezköy housing project; a hotel in Sarigerme; and two hotels in Ayin Bay and Hisarönü Marina. Marti Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

3.Name: S. Nurkan Kacmaz
3.Title: Corp. Governance and Investor Relations Unit Mang.
